name: A Letter Arrives
description:
Dear %ENTHRALLED_NAME,

I am writing to you as I fear that some of our countrymen are acting in league with dark powers. I have always trusted and respected you, and hope I can count on you in the face of this danger.

Your friend, %PERSON_NAME

choices.name: 'Dear Friend, Thank you for bringing me your concerns...'

outcomes.description: You accept the boon. Your body feels lighter and a faint sparkle surrounds you.
You wait with your hands held outwards, but your calls are left unanswered. Perhaps another day.
Nothing good comes without a price. You step back before the pleasant warmth envelops you.
